It doesn't adhere to Verilog syntax and it's impossible to identify the name of the module, its functionality, the input and output ports, and the internal signals used, or to provide an overview of the different blocks or sections in the code and their functions based on this text.

Once valid code is provided, I would be able to complete your request and provide a detailed specification of the module as outlined in your question.
